channel.title: RuneWar - Mac Compatable
channel.description:
[CENTER][img]http://i.imgur.com/yOGnQfQ.png[/img][/CENTER] [glow=red,2,300]Information[/glow] Rune-War is setting the benchmark in RSPS Quality, this means that when you play our server, you'll see it's on a whole different level to all other servers out there.
We are here to take over the RSPS scene with our technical skills and your support we could do it, so if you want to be part of what will one day be the greatest RSPS ever made then get started today.
Our skills work 100% like runescape Our combat work's 100% like runescape Our Minigames are so unique and advanced, jagex them selves couldn't even come up with what we have at RuneWar.
[glow=red,2,300]Links[/glow] [center] [img]http://betascape.info/img/Forums32x32.png[/img][URL=http://"http://www.rune-war.net/webclient.php"] Website [/URL] [img]http://betascape.info/img/Play32x32.png[/img] [URL=http://"http://www.rune-war.net/webclient.php"] Play Now [/URL] [img]http://betascape.info/img/Play32x32.png[/img] [URL=http://"http://www.rune-war.net/rw.jar"] Download [/URL][/center]
[glow=red,2,300]Features[/glow] - BankTabs/Search - No lagg, and minimum bugs - Nice clean looking server - Skilling points - New nex armours - Ability to choose exp rate - OldSchool PK Arena - Pvp prizes and rewards - Tokaar hal cape (from fight caves minigame) - Smart NPC interaction and combat - Amazing custom interfaces - Choose your class and loadout - Tabbed shops - 100% Brimhaven agility Arena - Dwarf Multi-cannon - Skilling minigame - 4 Unique pvm minigames (Including ZombiesX the most advanced zombie minigame ever seen in a rsps) - 100% All skills working like real runescape - Web client, JWS client, and downloadable client - Custom Dungeoneering - Unique Prestige System ( Never seen before)
[glow=red,2,300]Media[/glow] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/edkwgF9.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/QN8RMKt.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/BFNCQUu.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/sN9c0bV.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/bHZEcLL.png[/img]
[glow=red,2,300]Support us[/glow] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/yOGnQfQ.png[/img]

item.title: RuneWar - Mac Compatable

item.description:

[CENTER][/CENTER]
[glow=red,2,300]Information[/glow]
Rune-War is setting the benchmark in RSPS Quality, this means that when you play our server, you’ll see it’s on a whole different level to all other servers out there.

We are here to take over the RSPS scene with our technical skills and your support we could do it, so if you want to be part of what will one day be the greatest RSPS ever made then get started today.

Our skills work 100% like runescape
Our combat work’s 100% like runescape
Our Minigames are so unique and advanced, jagex them selves couldn’t even come up with what we have at RuneWar.
